name: VR Rock Climbing
description:
"VR Rock Climbing" is a VR competitive game in the wild mountains, where you can escape through rock climbing.
It's not just about moving, it's exploring well-designed rock walls with climbing gear and trying to climb to the top.
Birds in the air will harass us when climbing, please try not to look up at them as much as possible, otherwise it will give you a special "gift".



game operation
Handle movement in swipe handle view
Handle trigger button to control climbing position lock
